attributes.action: Ban strobe lighting in public places in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Ban strobe lighting in public places because it affects people with epilepsy like my self I have raised money over the years for epilepsy charities and they all think the same as I do I have worked with the local council to make them more aware of what it can do and I won them over and now I need to make sure you are if you ban smoking in public places so this should be it's not 1980s anymore as we'll so make sure you do the right thing and help people in the uk
